resources.string: \"Accessing our growing list of properties where you can pay rent monthly. With Rent4Less, paying rent is on your terms\"
Join our growing community.\nPay rent monthly?
1. No Agent Fee\n2. No commission\n3. Pay and Pack in
1. Earn steady rental income on your property\n2. Earn your property with Africa\'s best facilities Mgt. Company\n3. Start immediately

Rent4Less by Alpha Mead is a rental scheme designed to provide a flexible and convenient option for middle income Nigerians to rent homes. With this scheme, you can now spread out payment for apartments in choice locations, by paying a specified rate, on a monthly basis.

Rent4Less is for us, more than a product. It is a responsibility. A responsibility to ensure middle- income Nigerians put their money in other viable investment assets, rather rents that returns nothing at the end of the year. It is a responsibility to demonstrate to investors in Real Estate that rental income is possible“
Be the first to know About \nNew Homes. \nSubscribe to our Newsletter.
